00068 void SetupTextInputForMapInfo()
00069 {
00070       UINT16 str[10];
00071       
00072       InitTextInputModeWithScheme( DEFAULT_SCHEME );
00073 
00074       AddUserInputField( NULL );  //just so we can use short cut keys while not typing.
00075 
00076       //light rgb fields
00077       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peRed );
00078       AddTextInputField( 10, 394, 25, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00079       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peGreen );
00080       AddTextInputField( 10, 414, 25, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00081       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peBlue );
00082       AddTextInputField( 10, 434, 25, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00083 
00084       swprintf( str, L"%d", gsLightRadius );
00085       AddTextInputField( 120, 394, 25, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00086       swprintf( str, L"%d", gusLightLevel );
00087       AddTextInputField( 120, 414, 25, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00088 
00089       //Scroll restriction ID
00090       if( !gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID )
00091             swprintf( str, L"" );
00092       else
00093             swprintf( str, L"%d", gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID );
00094       AddTextInputField( 210, 420, 30, 20, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00095 
00096       //exit grid input fields
00097       swprintf( str, L"%c%d", gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY + 'A' - 1, gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX );
00098       AddTextInputField( 338, 363, 30, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_EXCLUSIVE_COORDINATE );
00099       swprintf( str, L"%d", gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ );
00100       AddTextInputField( 338, 383, 30, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 1, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00101       swprintf( str, L"%d", gExitGrid.usGridNo );
00102       AddTextInputField( 338, 403, 40, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 5, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00103 }

00105 void UpdateMapInfo()
00106 {
00107       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00108       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00109 
00110       SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00111       mprintf( 38, 399, L"R");
00112       SetFontForeground( FONT_GREEN );
00113       mprintf( 38, 419, L"G");
00114       SetFontForeground( FONT_DKBLUE );
00115       mprintf( 38, 439, L"B");
00116 
00117       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00118       mprintf( 65, 369, L"Prime" );
00119       mprintf( 65, 382, L"Night" );
00120       mprintf( 65, 397, L"24Hrs" );
00121 
00122       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00123       mprintf( 148, 399, L"Radius");
00124 
00125       if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00126             SetFontForeground( FONT_DKYELLOW );
00127       mprintf( 148, 414, L"Underground" );
00128       mprintf( 148, 423, L"Light Level" );
00129 
00130       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00131       mprintf( 230, 369, L"Outdoors" );
00132       mprintf( 230, 384, L"Basement" );
00133       mprintf( 230, 399, L"Caves" );
00134 
00135       SetFontForeground( FONT_ORANGE );
00136       mprintf( 250, 420, L"Restricted" );
00137       mprintf( 250, 430, L"Scroll ID" );
00138 
00139       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00140       mprintf( 368, 363, L"Destination");
00141       mprintf( 368, 372, L"Sector" );
00142       mprintf( 368, 383, L"Destination");
00143       mprintf( 368, 392, L"Bsmt. Level" );
00144       mprintf( 378, 403, L"Dest." );
00145       mprintf( 378, 412, L"GridNo" );
00146       SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00147 }

00149 void UpdateMapInfoFields()
00150 {
00151       UINT16 str[10];
00152       //Update the text fields to reflect the validated values.
00153       //light rgb fields
00154       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peRed );
00155       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 1, str );
00156       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peGreen );
00157       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 2, str );
00158       swprintf( str, L"%d", gEditorLightColor.peBlue );
00159       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 3, str );
00160 
00161       swprintf( str, L"%d", gsLightRadius );
00162       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 4, str );
00163       swprintf( str, L"%d", gusLightLevel );
00164       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 5, str );
00165 
00166       if( !gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID )
00167             swprintf( str, L"" );
00168       else
00169             swprintf( str, L"%d", gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID );
00170       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 6, str );
00171 
00172       ApplyNewExitGridValuesToTextFields();
00173 }
00174 
00175 void ExtractAndUpdateMapInfo()
00176 {
00177       UINT16 str[10];
00178       INT32 temp;
00179       BOOLEAN fUpdateLight1 = FALSE;
00180       //extract light1 colors
00181       temp = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 ), 255 );
00182       if( temp != -1 && temp != gEditorLightColor.peRed )
00183       {
00184             fUpdateLight1 = TRUE;
00185             gEditorLightColor.peRed = (UINT8)temp;
00186       }
00187       temp = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 ), 255 );
00188       if( temp != -1 && temp != gEditorLightColor.peGreen )
00189       {
00190             fUpdateLight1 = TRUE;
00191             gEditorLightColor.peGreen = (UINT8)temp;
00192       }
00193       temp = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 ), 255 );
00194       if( temp != -1 && temp != gEditorLightColor.peBlue )
00195       {
00196             fUpdateLight1 = TRUE;
00197             gEditorLightColor.peBlue = (UINT8)temp;
00198       }
00199       if( fUpdateLight1 )
00200       {
00201             gfEditorForceShadeTableRebuild = TRUE;
00202             LightSetColors(   &gEditorLightColor, 1 );
00203             gfEditorForceShadeTableRebuild = FALSE;
00204       }
00205 
00206       //extract radius
00207       temp = max( min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 4 ), 8 ), 1 );
00208       if( temp != -1 )
00209             gsLightRadius = (INT16)temp;
00210       temp = max( min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 5 ), 15 ), 1 );
00211       if( temp != -1 && temp != gusLightLevel )
00212       {
00213             gusLightLevel = (UINT16)temp;
00214             gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00215             ubAmbientLightLevel = (UINT8)(EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - gusLightLevel);
00216             LightSetBaseLevel( ubAmbientLightLevel );
00217             LightSpriteRenderAll();
00218       }
00219 
00220       temp = (INT8)GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 6 );
00221       if( temp == -1 )
00222             gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID = 0;
00223       else
00224             gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID = (UINT8)temp;
00225       
00226       //set up fields for exitgrid information 
00227       Get16BitStringFromField( 7, str );
00228       if( str[0] >= 'a' && str[0] <= 'z' )
00229             str[0] -= 32; //uppercase it!
00230       if( str[0] >= 'A' && str[0] <= 'Z' && 
00231               str[1] >= '0' && str[1] <= '9' )
00232       { //only update, if coordinate is valid.
00233             gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY = (UINT8)(str[0] - 'A' + 1);
00234             gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = (UINT8)(str[1] - '0');
00235             if( str[2] >= '0' && str[2] <= '9' )
00236                   gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = (UINT8)(gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX * 10 + str[2] - '0' );
00237             gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = (UINT8)max( min( gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX, 16 ), 1 );
00238             gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY = (UINT8)max( min( gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY, 16 ), 1 );
00239       }
00240       gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ    = (UINT8)max( min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 8 ), 3 ), 0 );
00241       gExitGrid.usGridNo                               = (UINT16)max( min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 9 ), 25600 ), 0 );
00242 
00243       UpdateMapInfoFields();
00244 }
00245 
00246 BOOLEAN ApplyNewExitGridValuesToTextFields()
00247 {
00248       UINT16 str[10];
00249       //exit grid input fields
00250       if( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_MAPINFO )
00251             return FALSE;
00252       swprintf( str, L"%c%d", gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY + 'A' - 1, gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX );
00253       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 7, str );
00254       swprintf( str, L"%d", gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ );
00255       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 8, str );
00256       swprintf( str, L"%d", gExitGrid.usGridNo );
00257       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 9, str );
00258       SetActiveField( 0 );
00259       return TRUE;
00260 }
00261 
00262 UINT16 usCurrentExitGridNo = 0;
00263 void LocateNextExitGrid()
00264 {
00265       EXITGRID ExitGrid;
00266       UINT16 i;
00267       for( i = usCurrentExitGridNo + 1; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00268       {
00269             if( GetExitGrid( i, &ExitGrid ) )
00270             {
00271                   usCurrentExitGridNo = i;
00272                   CenterScreenAtMapIndex( i );
00273                   return;
00274             }
00275       }
00276       for( i = 0; i < usCurrentExitGridNo; i++ )
00277       {
00278             if( GetExitGrid( i, &ExitGrid ) )
00279             {
00280                   usCurrentExitGridNo = i;
00281                   CenterScreenAtMapIndex( i );
00282                   return;
00283             }
00284       }
00285 }

00287 void ChangeLightDefault( INT8 bLightType )
00288 {
00289       UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_PRIMETIME_LIGHT + gbDefaultLightType );
00290       gbDefaultLightType = bLightType;
00291       ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_PRIMETIME_LIGHT + gbDefaultLightType );
00292 }
